loadIdentity().Description: Sets the matrix values to identity

Parameters: float: vertical field of view angle in degrees
float: aspect ratio of the screen
float: near cliping plane, must be positive
float: far clipping plane, must be positive
loadPerspective(float, float, float, flo.Description: Sets current values to be a perspective projection matrix
loadPerspective(float, float, float, flo.FullName: void loadPerspective (float fovy, float aspect, float near, float far)

transpose().Description: Sets the current matrix to its transpose

loadScale(float, float, float).Description: Sets current values to be a scale matrix of given dimensions
loadScale(float, float, float).FullName: void loadScale (float x, float y, float z)

Parameters: float: location of the left vertical clipping plane
float: location of the right vertical clipping plane
float: location of the bottom horizontal clipping plane
float: location of the top horizontal clipping plane
float: location of the near clipping plane
float: location of the far clipping plane

Parameters: float: location of the left vertical clipping plane
float: location of the right vertical clipping plane
float: location of the bottom horizontal clipping plane
float: location of the top horizontal clipping plane
float: location of the near clipping plane, must be positive
float: location of the far clipping plane, must be positive
loadFrustum(float, float, float, float,.Description: Sets current values to be a perspective projection matrix
loadFrustum(float, float, float, float,.FullName: void loadFrustum (float l, float r, float b, float t, float n, float f)

Parameters: Matrix4f: right hand side to multiply by
multiply(android.support.v8.renderscript.Description: Post-multiplies the current matrix by a given parameter

loadTranslate(float, float, float).Description: Sets current values to be a translation matrix of given dimensions
loadTranslate(float, float, float).FullName: void loadTranslate (float x, float y, float z)

Parameters: int: column of the value to set
int: row of the value to set
set(int, int, float).Description: Sets the value for a given row and column
set(int, int, float).FullName: void set (int x, int y, float v)

loadMultiply(android.support.v8.rendersc.Description: Sets current values to be the result of multiplying two given matrices

inverse().Description: Sets the current matrix to its inverse

loadProjectionNormalized(int, int).Description: Helper function to set the current values to a perspective projection matrix with aspect ratio defined by the parameters and (near, far), (bottom, top) mapping to (-1, 1) at z = 0

getArray().Description: Return a reference to the internal array representing matrix values. Modifying this array will also change the matrix

Parameters: float: values to set the matrix to, must be 16 floats long
Matrix4f(float[]).Description: Creates a new matrix and sets its values from the given parameter

translate(float, float, float).Description: Modifies the current matrix by post-multiplying it with a translation matrix of given dimensions
translate(float, float, float).FullName: void translate (float x, float y, float z)

Parameters: Matrix4f: matrix to load the values from
load(android.support.v8.renderscript.Mat.Description: Sets the values of the matrix to those of the parameter

rotate(float, float, float, float).Description: Modifies the current matrix by post-multiplying it with a rotation matrix of certain angle about a given axis
rotate(float, float, float, float).FullName: void rotate (float rot, float x, float y, float z)

Parameters: int: location of the right vertical clipping plane
int: location of the bottom horizontal clipping plane
loadOrthoWindow(int, int).Description: Set current values to be an orthographic projection matrix with the right and bottom clipping planes set to the given values. Left and top clipping planes are set to 0. Near and far are set to -1, 1 respectively

Returns: value in the yth row and xth column
Parameters: int: column of the value to return
int: row of the value to return
get(int, int).Description: Returns the value for a given row and column

scale(float, float, float).Description: Modifies the current matrix by post-multiplying it with a scale matrix of given dimensions
scale(float, float, float).FullName: void scale (float x, float y, float z)

inverseTranspose().Description: Sets the current matrix to its inverse transpose

loadRotate(float, float, float, float).Description: Sets current values to be a rotation matrix of certain angle about a given axis
loadRotate(float, float, float, float).FullName: void loadRotate (float rot, float x, float y, float z)

ClassDesc: Class for exposing the native RenderScript rs_matrix4x4 type back to the Android system.
